visualization_prompt: Create a Highcharts chartOptions object to render a spline chart with the title 'Monthly Average Rainfall'. The chart should have styled axes and labels with specific colors and font sizes. The data series should include monthly rainfall data for a year. Custom colors should be used for the series, and additional configurations should include chart margins, background, and a legend positioned at the top-right corner.
visualization_explanation: The provided Highcharts chartOptions object is configured to render a spline chart titled 'Monthly Average Rainfall'. The x-axis represents the months of the year with styled labels, and the y-axis represents the rainfall in millimeters with a styled title. The data series includes monthly rainfall data for a year, with a custom color applied to the series. The legend is positioned at the top-right corner of the chart. Additional configurations include a light background color for the chart and specific margins to ensure the chart elements are spaced appropriately.
